mapper.insert: insert into user(openid, name, phone, sex, id_number, avatar, create_time) values (#{openid}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{avatar}, #{createTime})
mapper.select:
select count(*) as `users` from (
select #{dateTime} time union all ) t1 left join user t2 on t2.create_time <= t1.time where t1.time != 'null' group by t1.time

select if(t2.create_time is null, 0, count(*)) as `users` from (
select #{date} time union all ) t1 left join user t2 on DATE(t2.create_time) = t1.time where t1.time != 'null' group by t1.time
